attributes.action: Declare a National Day of Prayer for Covid19
attributes.additional_details: We have seen this in America but we have also seen a rising up of the church across social media platforms. However all we see is panic and talk of this having years of affects. The only thing that will change this is God. The Bible has stories of similar things and when people turned to God things changed.
attributes.background: To declare a National Day of prayer against the Covid 19 Virus.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
